Class Handler

  • java.lang.Object
    • Handler
  • public class Handler
extends java.lang.Object
    Handler is used to update and process any and EVERY GameObject & Timer passed through.
    Version:
    v1.0_Alpha
    Author:
    Richard Healey and reference

      • tick

        protected void tick()
        Tick is used to manipulate everything passed through it. This is used in every single class connected to the Game::handler with a tick() method.
